snippet: Seven Cameroon players have said they do not want to go to the African Nations Cup finals, setting them on a collision course with the country’s football federation and a possible ban from playing for their clubs while the tournament is on....
lead_paragraph: Seven Cameroon players have said they do not want to go to the African Nations Cup finals, setting them on a collision course with the country’s football federation and a possible ban from playing for their clubs while the tournament is on.

headline.main: Cameroon Players Shun African Nations Cup
headline.print_headline: Cameroon Players Shun African Nations Cup
